ns1:event.name: event__initialize
event__initialize
event__initialize
ns1:event.ns1:script:
A = A + 1
if ( count($record.GT_FORMLINES_AS.DATA[*].LINELEV) gt A ) then this.margin.leftInset = concat( 0.5 + 2 * $record.GT_FORMLINES_AS.DATA[A].LINELEV, "mm") endif

ns1:event.name: event__initialize
event__initialize
event__initialize
ns1:event.ns1:script:
L = L + 1
if ( count($record.GT_FORMLINES_LE.DATA[*].LINELEV) gt L ) then this.margin.leftInset = concat( 0.5 + 2 * $record.GT_FORMLINES_LE.DATA[L].LINELEV, "mm") endif

ns1:event.name: event__initialize
event__initialize
event__initialize
ns1:event.ns1:script:
if ( $record.GS_FORMHDR.BILATYPE eq "I" or $record.GV_ORIENT eq "L" ) then data.Balance.presence = "hidden" endif
if ($record.GS_FORMHDR.GSBER eq null) then data.Balance.GSBER.presence = "hidden" else data.Balance.GSBER.presence = "visible" endif
if ($record.GS_FORMHDR.PRCTR eq null) then data.Balance.PRCTR.presence = "hidden" else data.Balance.PRCTR.presence = "visible" endif

ns1:event.name: event__initialize
event__initialize
event__initialize
ns1:event.ns1:script:
P = P + 1
this.margin.leftInset = concat(0.5 + 2 * $record.GT_FORMLINES_PL.DATA[P].LINELEV, "mm")

ns1:event.name: event__initialize
event__initialize
event__initialize
ns1:event.ns1:script:
if ( $record.GS_FORMHDR.BILATYPE eq "B" or $record.GV_ORIENT eq "L") then data.Income.presence = "hidden" endif
if ($record.GS_FORMHDR.GSBER eq null) then data.Income.GSBER.presence = "hidden" else data.Income.GSBER.presence = "visible" endif
if ($record.GS_FORMHDR.PRCTR eq null) then data.Income.PRCTR.presence = "hidden" else data.Income.PRCTR.presence = "visible" endif

ns1:event.name: event__initialize
ns1:event.ns1:script:
AL = AL + 1
if ( count($record.GT_FORMLINES_AS1.DATA[*].LINELEV) gt AL ) then this.margin.leftInset = concat( 0.5 + 2 * $record.GT_FORMLINES_AS1.DATA[AL].LINELEV, "mm") endif

ns1:event.name: event__initialize
event__initialize
event__initialize
ns1:event.ns1:script:
LL = LL + 1
if ( count($record.GT_FORMLINES_LE1.DATA[*].LINELEV) gt LL ) then this.margin.leftInset = concat( 0.5 + 2 * $record.GT_FORMLINES_LE1.DATA[LL].LINELEV, "mm") endif

ns1:event.name: event__initialize
event__initialize
event__initialize
event__initialize
event__initialize
event__initialize
event__initialize
event__initialize
ns1:event.ns1:script:
PL = PL + 1
this.margin.leftInset = concat(0.5 + 2 * $record.GT_FORMLINES_PL1.DATA[PL].LINELEV, "mm")

ns1:event.name: event__initialize
event__initialize
event__initialize
ns1:event.ns1:script:
if ( $record.GS_FORMHDR.BILATYPE eq "B" or $record.GV_ORIENT ne "L" ) then data.Income_L.presence = "hidden" endif
if ($record.GS_FORMHDR.GSBER eq null) then data.Income_L.GSBER.presence = "hidden" else data.Income_L.GSBER.presence = "visible" endif
if ($record.GS_FORMHDR.PRCTR eq null) then data.Income_L.PRCTR.presence = "hidden" else data.Income_L.PRCTR.presence = "visible" endif
